bottlenecks.description: Low CPU efficiency (0.0%) indicates I/O or synchronization bottlenecks
bottlenecks.performance_impact: CPU underutilization reduces processing throughput by ~100%

Review database query performance and connection pooling

Implement connection pooling for database access

Consider data compression to reduce I/O volume
